text: The 2013–14 season is PAS Giannina F.C.'s 19th competitive season in the top flight of Greek football, 4th season in the Super League Greece, and 48th year in existence as a football club. They also compete in the Greek Cup. == Players == Updated:- {| class="wikitable" ! style="background:#265cab; color:white; text-align:center;" |No. ! style="background:#265cab; color:white;
